source_sentence: 延應二年四月十六日(申時)於醍醐寺地藏院書寫了同　　　八月二日令交合了　　道成寬保初元醉年秋八月二十二日。
translation: On the 16th day of the 4th month (Shenqi) in the 2nd year of Enō's reign, he wrote the same thing in writing at the Daigoji Temple Jizōin on the 22nd day of the 8th month in the autumn of the first year of the drunkenness of Dōshō Kanpō.

source_sentence: 令宮野常新遂書寫余於東窓校考了僧正賢賀(五十八)。
translation: He had Miyano Jōshin then write, "I examined the monk Masahide (fifty-eight) in the east ward.
